name: Fabled Marcosia
effectText: If this card is in your hand: You can discard up to 2 monsters, except "Fabled Marcosia", but including another "Fabled" monster, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If Summoned this way, this card gains 200 ATK for each monster discarded. If this card is discarded to the GY: Add 1 "Fabled" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Fabled Marcosia" once per turn.
